segments.text: The boy is really stretching high to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting for her cookie, she looks so excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up with her palm open, ready to catch the cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both going to be in trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking a fall here, but he seems determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, it's kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a risky game they're playing, but it's also kind of fun to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they stay safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
